::Autofire/Stratus::

Autofire watches Megatron get knocked into a bush. He sighs. If he 
was going to rescue his employer it would have to be quick. Running 
to the bush wouldn't be a good idea, so he would use his vehicle mode 
if it came to that.

He watches the scene without acting yet, though. If Megatron got more 
beat up, he would interfere.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Stratus watches curiously, not really understanding what was going on.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Motormaster jumps back from the lock of weapons, and swings his 
sword wide
> in and ark towards Megatron. Megatron is not able to get his mace 
up in
> time, and receives the blade, as it plunges into his neck. A 
grinding of
> Metal against Metal can be heard, and Motormaster strains, his arms 
heating
> up from the amount of energy used, to try to finish the stroke 
cleanly,
> through Megatron's head.
> 
> The sword opens a small wound, and as oil starts to produce, it 
continues.
> Megatron finally brings the mace, in a wide swing, and hits 
Motormaster
> head on, the impact sending the Stunticon leader into the star 
ship, and
> the small part caves in. Megatron replaces his mace with his hand 
again,
> and steps forward. "Give it up Motormaster."
> 
> For a moment there is silence, then the ruble comes to life, and
> Motormaster lunges out of it, bringing fist after fist into 
Megatrons
> chest. The Slagmaker doubles back from the pain, and tries to put 
his hands
> up, but Motormaster puts his fists together, and rocks Megatron 
with an Axe
> like blow across the jaw, then again across the jaw, in an upward 
stroke,
> sending Megatron back several 100 feet, and into the foilage. 
Motormaster
> transforms, and follows his would be fake leader.
